programs.name: Marriott Bonvoy
programs.summary: Massive global reach with 30 brands and 5th Night Free awards that stretch certificates and points.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Marriott Bonvoy elite tiers, certificates, and redemption strategies to maximize the world’s largest hotel program.

items: 30 distinct hotel brands that span from budget-friendly Moxy to ultra-luxury Ritz-Carlton Reserve.
Dynamic pricing combined with point top-offs makes free night certificates extremely flexible.
Elite Night Credits roll in from co-branded cards and annual Choice Benefits unlock milestone perks.
Homes & Villas portfolio offers vacation rentals that still earn elite night credits and points.
overview.note: Marriott Bonvoy is built for road warriors chasing aspirational redemptions without sacrificing coverage in secondary markets.

image.alt: Modern Marriott hotel lobby with warm lighting

rows.label: Ultimate Reservation Guarantee
rows.description: If we can’t honor your reservation, Marriott will cover a comparable stay nearby and compensate for the inconvenience.

rows.label: Bonus points on stays
rows.description: Earn extra points on eligible hotel purchases depending on elite tier.

rows.label: Late checkout
rows.description: Request complimentary late checkout to enjoy more time on property (availability varies).

rows.label: Welcome gift
rows.description: Receive a special amenity or bonus points at participating brands upon arrival.

rows.label: Enhanced upgrades
rows.description: Space-available room upgrades; suites included for Platinum Elite and higher.

rows.label: Lounge access
rows.description: Executive lounge entry with complimentary breakfast where available.

rows.label: Annual Choice Benefit
rows.description: Select milestone rewards like Suite Night Awards, bonus Elite Night Credits, or gift Silver status.

rows.label: 48-Hour Guarantee
rows.description: Book by 3 p.m., two days prior to arrival and Marriott will find you a room.

rows.label: Your24
rows.description: Choose your own 24-hour check-in/check-out window through the Ambassador service team.

rows.label: Ambassador Service
rows.description: Dedicated personal Ambassador handles complex itineraries and special requests.

rows.label: Airline & travel partners
rows.description: Elite members tap into partnerships with Emirates Skywards, United MileagePlus®, and Hertz Gold Plus Rewards®.

statusLevels.note: Ambassador Elite layers personalized service on top of Titanium benefits for frequent business travelers.

image.alt: Hotel loyalty membership card on a marble table

items: Marriott Bonvoy Boundless® Credit Card
Marriott Bonvoy Brilliant® American Express® Card
Marriott Bonvoy Bevy™ American Express® Card
Marriott Bonvoy Business® American Express® Card
coBrandedCards.note: Pair a personal and business card to stack 30 Elite Night Credits toward Platinum status each year.

image.alt: Stack of travel credit cards on a desk

items: 10 points per $1 spent at most Marriott brands.
5 points per $1 at extended stay brands like Element, Residence Inn, and TownePlace Suites.
2 points per $1 on Homes & Villas by Marriott Bonvoy stays.
Transfer partner bonus when converting from American Express Membership Rewards® at 3:1 ratio.
Typical redemption value ranges from 0.6 – 0.9 cents per point depending on destination.
Look for PointSavers rates to drop nightly cost by up to 20%.
Use Cash + Points on high demand dates to preserve balances without paying full cash rate.
Marriott Bonvoy is free to join; no paid subscription tier is required.
Titanium Elite and Ambassador Elite benefits are earned exclusively through stay activity or co-branded spend.
5th Night Free on award stays of four nights or longer.
Annual free night certificates worth 35K–85K points from premium credit cards.
Earned Choice Benefits include Suite Night Awards and Elite Night Credits.
Partnership with Uber and Eat Pass to earn Bonvoy points on rides and deliveries in select regions.
otherBenefits.note: Maximize Marriott Bonvoy by stacking 5th Night Free with off-peak pricing for aspirational resorts.

programs.name: World of Hyatt
programs.footprint: 1,300+ hotels with outsized luxury and all-inclusive partners
programs.summary: Low award rates, milestone rewards, and partnerships like Small Luxury Hotels make Hyatt points incredibly valuable.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how World of Hyatt milestones, suite upgrades, and transfer partners deliver unmatched value for award stays.

items: Fixed award chart keeps premium redemptions predictable across 8 categories.
Milestone rewards deliver suite upgrades, club access, and FIND credits every 10 nights starting at 20.
Small Luxury Hotels of the World partnership expands boutique options with elite benefits.
All-inclusive brands like Secrets and Dreams can be booked with Hyatt points at competitive rates.
overview.note: Hyatt’s smaller footprint is offset by premium partner properties and transferable points from Chase Ultimate Rewards®.

image.alt: Luxury resort pool overlooking the ocean

rows.label: Bonus points on stays
rows.description: Base points are 5 per $1 before elite bonuses are applied.

rows.label: Room upgrades
rows.description: Space-available upgrades; Globalist includes standard suites at check-in.

rows.label: Club lounge access
rows.description: Access lounges or complimentary breakfast at Hyatt Regency, Grand Hyatt, and select brands.

rows.label: Milestone rewards
rows.description: Earn suite upgrades, FIND credits, and Guest of Honor awards every 10 elite nights.
values: Guest of Honor + My Hyatt Concierge

rows.label: Guest of Honor
rows.description: Extend Globalist benefits to friends or family on award stays.

rows.label: My Hyatt Concierge
rows.description: Dedicated team assists with complex itineraries, suite requests, and special occasions.

statusLevels.note: Aim for 60-night Globalist status to unlock waived resort fees, free breakfast, and the Guest of Honor benefit.

image.alt: Guest relaxing in a hotel suite with city view

items: World of Hyatt Credit Card
World of Hyatt Business Credit Card
coBrandedCards.note: Personal and business cards together provide 10 elite night credits annually plus spending-based night boosts.

items: 5 base points per $1 on eligible Hyatt purchases.
Discoverist, Explorist, and Globalist earn 10%, 20%, and 30% bonuses respectively.
All-inclusive resorts award based on room rate before taxes and fees.
Transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards® at a 1:1 ratio instantly.
Category 1 starts at 3,500 points off-peak for standard rooms.
Premium suites can be booked with a fixed multiplier over standard room pricing.
Use Cash + Points when nightly rates creep above 2 cents per point for extra value.
World of Hyatt membership is complimentary; status is earned via nights, base points, or meetings.
Hyatt Leverage corporate accounts offer discounted rates without changing elite qualification.
Guest of Honor lets friends enjoy your Globalist perks on award stays.
Milestone Rewards at 40, 50, and 60 nights include suite upgrade awards.
Brand Explorer free night certificate after staying at 5 unique Hyatt brands.
Partnership with American Airlines AAdvantage® allows elite members to earn bonus miles and Loyalty Points.

programs.name: Hilton Honors
programs.summary: Dynamic pricing paired with automatic elite status from credit cards makes Hilton easy to engage with.
programs.seoDescription: Find out how Hilton Honors elite perks, free breakfast benefits, and 5th Night Free awards make points easy to spend.

items: Nearly every Hilton brand participates in Honors, from Hampton to Waldorf Astoria.
Award pricing is flexible but often caps at 120K points for luxury properties.
Automatic elite status from Amex co-branded cards speeds up benefit access.
Points pool with up to 10 friends or family to reach redemptions faster.
overview.note: Hilton Honors excels when you combine frequent points sales, Amex transfer bonuses, and the 5th Night Free feature.

rows.label: Daily food & beverage credit / breakfast
rows.description: Gold and Diamond receive complimentary breakfast or a daily F&B credit at most full-service brands in the Americas.

rows.label: Fifth Night Free
rows.description: Receive the fifth night free on standard room reward stays of five nights or more.

rows.label: Milestone bonuses
rows.description: Starting at 40 nights, earn 10,000 bonus points every 10 nights plus 30,000 more at 60 nights.

statusLevels.note: Hilton Honors Diamond can be secured instantly with the Hilton Aspire card, unlocking top-tier perks without nightly requirements.

items: Hilton Honors American Express Aspire Card
Hilton Honors American Express Surpass® Card
Hilton Honors American Express Card
Hilton Honors American Express Business Card
coBrandedCards.note: Aspire cardholders receive automatic Diamond status plus an annual free night certificate.

items: 10 base points per $1 at most Hilton brands.
Limited service brands like Tru and Home2 Suites earn 5 base points per $1.
Elite tier bonuses stack on top of base points and ongoing global promotions.
American Express Membership Rewards® transfer to Hilton at a 1:2 ratio.
Standard room rewards start around 5,000 points and scale dynamically.
Aim for 0.4–0.6 cents per point at luxury properties and peak season resorts.
Use Points & Money awards to conserve points when cash rates are low.
Hilton Honors is complimentary; elite tiers can also be gifted or granted via American Express cards.
Hilton Grand Vacations owners may receive complimentary elite status accelerators.
5th Night Free on award stays of five nights or more.
Points pooling allows sharing with up to 10 members at no cost.
Elite rollover nights help you jumpstart the following year’s qualification.
Partnerships with Lyft and Live Nation generate extra points on rides and event tickets.

programs.name: IHG One Rewards
programs.footprint: 6,000+ hotels with luxury brands like Regent and Six Senses
programs.summary: Revamped elite program with milestone choice awards, lounge access for top tiers, and a healthy pipeline of new luxury properties.
programs.seoDescription: Get up to speed on IHG One Rewards benefits, milestone choices, and sweet spots for the program's flexible award pricing.

items: Dynamic award pricing often yields outsized value during off-peak dates.
Milestone Rewards let you pick suite upgrades, food & beverage credits, or annual lounge membership.
Chase co-branded cards include fourth-night-free awards and automatic Platinum status.
Luxury & Lifestyle brands like Kimpton and Regent deliver unique on-property perks.
overview.note: IHG’s overhaul introduced meaningful elite benefits, especially for travelers who cross 40 and 70 night milestones.

rows.label: Welcome amenity
values: Points or drink/snack at select brands
Points or drink/snack at select brands
Hot breakfast option at select brands

rows.label: Room upgrades
values: Best available rooms including suites (where offered)

rows.label: Lounge access
values: Guaranteed at Regent, InterContinental, Kimpton, and participating brands

rows.label: Milestone choice awards
rows.description: Pick from suite upgrades, annual lounge membership, or food & beverage credits starting at 20 nights.

statusLevels.note: Milestone Rewards are the secret sauce—plan your stays to hit 40 nights for two confirmable suite upgrades.

items: IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card
IHG One Rewards Premier Business Credit Card
IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card
coBrandedCards.note: Premier cards deliver a 40K free night certificate each cardmember year plus a 4th Night Free award perk.

items: 10 base points per $1 at most full-service and lifestyle brands.
5 base points per $1 at Staybridge Suites and Candlewood Suites.
Diamond elites earn a 100% point bonus on top of base earnings.
Chase Ultimate Rewards® transfer to IHG at a 1:1 ratio via the Chase Travel portal (Pay Yourself Back).
Dynamic pricing means off-peak redemptions can drop below 0.5 cents per point.
Fourth Night Free benefit on award stays with IHG Premier cards effectively reduces nightly cost by 25%.
Use Points & Cash to buy back discounted points when rates are favorable.
IHG One Rewards is complimentary; elite tiers come from stays, points, or qualifying credit card spend.
InterContinental Ambassador is a paid program that grants guaranteed upgrades, free weekend nights, and additional amenities at InterContinental hotels.
Kimpton Inner Circle elites receive chef's treats and on-property experiences.
PointBreaks promos occasionally offer select hotels for as low as 5,000 points per night.
Annual choice awards include a confirmable suite upgrade that can be applied to cash or award stays.
Partnership with Mr & Mrs Smith adds boutique properties with elite recognition and earn/burn options.
